name: ancient-peer
description: Friendly core of interaction of peers.

scripts.dev-link: npm link ancient-mixins && npm link ancient-cursor && npm link ancient-channels
scripts.dev-test: (rm -rf .dev && git clone -b dev https://github.com/AncientSouls/AncientSouls.github.io.git .dev && cd .dev && git submodule init && git submodule update && npm run dev-install) && npm link ./ && (cd .dev && npm run dev-use-links && npm run dev-check)
